name: San Matias - Mafia City
description: Time is running out! You play as a man named "The Canario". Fight hordes of enemies and try to survive in this city without laws. It's time to teach them a lesson!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5500 or better Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GEFORCE GTX 1070 or better Storage: 300 MB available space
